Shader::Pass

Shader::Pass Class Reference

#include <Shader.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Begins rendering specified pass using the shader.

Calls NS(Shader,beginPass)() in the constructor and NS(Shader,endPass)() in the destructor. Use this class instead of the methods directly for exception-safety.

See also:
NS(Shader,begin)


Public Member Functions

 Pass (Shader *shader, int pass)
 Starts rendering specified pass.
 ~Pass ()
 Ends rendering specified pass.
